title: Gates Of The Arctic National Park & Preserve: Research
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     History & Culture     Research               Research       The preservation efforts undertaken by the Cultural Resources staff with Gates of the Arctic is firmly based in research efforts. Most of the major projects carried out over the years have had a strong research focus and many have been directly tied to academic collaborations such as graduate degree programs. This has resulted in several peer reviewed journal articles and publications as well as unique digital materials. Follow the links below to learn more. Archaeological Research Historic Research Oral History Research
